public class OAuth2ProviderHelper{private String authorizationURL,scope,tokenURL,redirectURL,clientID,clientSecret,identityURL,identityProperty;public OAuth2ProviderHelper(Map<String,Object> params){this.authorizationURL=(String)params.get("authorizationURL");this.scope=(String)params.get("scope");this.tokenURL=(String)params.get("tokenURL");this.redirectURL=(String)params.get("redirectURL");this.clientID=(String)params.get("clientID");this.clientSecret=(String)params.get("clientSecret");this.identityURL=(String)params.get("identityURL");this.identityProperty=(String)params.get("identityProperty");if(this.identityProperty==null)this.identityProperty="email";}public String getAuthorizationSessionUrl(){try{return this.authorizationURL+"?client_id="+this.clientID+"&redirect_uri="+URLEncoder.encode(this.redirectURL,"UTF-8")+"&scope="+this.scope;}catch(UnsupportedEncodingException e){throw new RuntimeException(e);}}public String getValidAccessToken(String code){Map<String,Object> reqParams=new HashMap<String,Object>();reqParams.put("code",code);reqParams.put("client_id",this.clientID);reqParams.put("client_secret",this.clientSecret);reqParams.put("redirect_uri",this.redirectURL);HttpResponse response=RequestHttp.postJSON(this.tokenURL,reqParams);Map<String,Object> resultMap=response.toMap();return (String)resultMap.get("access_token");}public String getIdentity(String token){Map<String,Object> reqParams=new HashMap<String,Object>();Map<String,Object> reqHeaders=new HashMap<String,Object>();reqHeaders.put("Authorization","Bearer "+token);HttpResponse response=RequestHttp.postJSON(this.identityURL,reqParams,null,reqHeaders);Map<String,Object> resultMap=response.toMap();return (String)resultMap.get(this.identityProperty);}}
